pullRequest.title: If debugging of SearchHandler is turned on, the 1k first request will…

commit.message:
If debugging of SearchHandler is turned on, the 1k first request will have trace and timing information.
The 1k number is configurable in the container-http config.

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we can remove this throw because it breaks the API
Same: I don't think we can remove this throw because it breaks the API
